name: Sirens (Festival of Delusion)
description:
Use your Lunar Explorer Craft to follow a mysterious Siren that has appeared above the streets of a futuristic city, unlocking fragments of music as you approach...

Influenced by 'Luna Lander'(1969) and 'Dark Side of the Moon'(1973), 'SIRENS' is half video game and half new music release!

Play with keyboard controls, best with a gamepad.
